revised_title: Researches on Vanadium: Part II - Chlorides and Metallic Vanadium
tldr: This article investigates the preparation and properties of vanadium chlorides and the metal itself. The author successfully prepares three chlorides: vanadium tetrachloride, vanadium trichloride, and vanadium dichloride. Additionally, the author explores the preparation of vanadium mononitride and its composition, as well as the properties of metallic vanadium.
